channel.title: TeleVillage Potion
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "TeleVillage Potion" - TeleVillage Potions now cost 20000 Ryo (16000 with discount)

item.title: Re: TeleVillage Potion
item.content:encoded: Changing villages now is for free, once a day. If you need to switch villages again, then you need a televillage potion.

item.title: Re: TeleVillage Potion
item.content:encoded: i bought one before i left (price still hasn't changed on the wiki) but didn't use it. it must do something entirely different now.

item.title: Re: TeleVillage Potion
item.content:encoded: Yeah when I left my village I could apply for another one right away also. But I don't know what the televillage potion would be used for now.

item.title: TeleVillage Potion
item.content:encoded:
TeleVillage Potions now cost 20000 Ryo. one other odd thing i have noticed is that i have just left my village and have not taken my TeleVillage potion yet but i was able to apply to another village. can someone confirm this, and if this is true can someone tell me what the TeleVillage Potion now does post-recode.

thank you
